Configuration for OpenCms websites.

module.name: org.opencms.ade.containerpage
module.description:
The containerpage editor.

module.name: org.opencms.ade.contenteditor
module.description:
Editor for structured contents.
(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.editprovider
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 ADE toolbar direct edit provider
module.description:
This module contains an edit provider for the original Direct Edit which has a number of features from ADE.
(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.galleries
module.description:
Gwt based gallery dialog for OpenCms 8

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.postupload
module.description:
This module provides a dialog for editing the configured default properties of a file after uploading it.
(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.properties
module.description:
This module provides the properties dialog for the workplace.
(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.publish
module.description:
Gwt based publish dialog for OpenCms 8

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.sitemap
module.description:
ADE Sitemap Editor.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.ade.upload
module.description:
Gwt based upload dialog for OpenCms 8

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.editors
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Common Editing tools.

This module is needed to be able to edit files in the OpenCms Workplace.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.editors.codemirror
module.description:
This module adds the Open Source text editor "CodeMirror" to the OpenCms Workplace.

Install this module if you want a source code editor with syntax highlighting. The version of CodeMirror is 3.14

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.editors.tinymce
module.description:
This module contains TinyMCE editor for HTML pages and XML content.

The version of TinyMCE is 4.0.1

module.name: org.opencms.gwt
module.description:
Provides an OpenCms GWT framework.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.jquery
module.description: This modules includes the jQuery javascript libraries as well as several plugins used by OpenCms

module.name: org.opencms.locale.de
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 German localization for the workplace
module.description:
This module contains the German language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the german version of the OpenCms Workplace.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.es
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 Spanish localization for the workplace
module.description:
This module contains the Spanish language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the Spanish version of the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2013 by OpenCms Hispano (http://www.opencmshispano.com).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.it
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 Italian localization for the workplace
module.description:
This module contains the Italian language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the Italian version of the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2013 by Coranto Informatica di Antonio Cordeddu (http://www.coranto.it).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.ru
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 Russian localization for the workplace
module.description: OpenCms Localization

module.name: org.opencms.workplace
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace base files.

It includes common used dialogs and style sheets, that are needed by any workplace module.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.administration
module.description:
This module contains the base components for the administration view.

Its allows you to install and/or develop administration tools for OpenCms.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.categories
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace category folders.

It includes the system wide category folders.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.explorer
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace Explorer.

Install this module if you want a GUI to work on the OpenCms VFS.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.galleries
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace gallery folders.

It includes the system wide gallery folders.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.handler
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace handler files.

It includes the 404 and 500 error handlers that are showed in case of an error of a frontend application.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.help
module.nicename: OpenCms 9 Workplace online help - Base module
module.description:
This module installs the basic templates required for the online help in all languages.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.help.de
module.description:
This module contains the online help pages for the OpenCms workplace in German language.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.help.en
module.description:
This module contains the english online help pages for the OpenCms workplace.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.accounts
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the user accounts and groups.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.cache
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the different internal caches.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.content
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the content of resources.

Install this module if you want to modify file properties or content elements.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.database
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms database maintainance tools.

Install this module if you want to import/export data, it also contains a static export tool.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview
module.description:
This module contains Overviews for every OpenCms gallery types.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.history
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the file history feature.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.link
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for validating links in xml documents and pointer links.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.modules
module.description:
This module contains administration tools for managing the OpenCms modules.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.projects
module.description:
This module contains the tools for managing the OpenCms projects.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.publishqueue
module.description:
This module contains the tools for view the OpenCms publish queue.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.scheduler
module.description:
This module contains the tools for managing scheduled jobs.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.searchindex
module.description:
This module contains tools related to the search capabilities of OpenCms.

Install this module if you need search capabilities in OpenCms.

(c) 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.sites
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing multiple sites served by OpenCms.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.workplace
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace maintenance tools.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH (http://www.alkacon.com).
